{{DEFAULTSORT:Siege of Myth-Drannor}}
'''''The Siege of Myth-Drannor''''' was a song in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]] derived from the exploits of the [[adventurer]]s [[Kevin Mittak|Kevin]] and [[Krynna Mittak]] in [[Myth Drannor]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/62/The New Rogues Gallery: The Freelancers}}
